title: Pea and garden mint fritters

ingredients.content: 2 spring onions/shallots, trimmed and cut into thirds
20 g extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for frying
1 lemon, cut into wedges, to serve (optional)

preparations.content: Place spring onions/shallots, garlic and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and sauté <b>2 min/120°C/speed 2<b>.
Add flour, bicarbonate of soda, salt, mint and peas, then blend <b>2 sec/speed 7<b>.

Place a large frying pan over medium heat and add oil. Shape 2 tablespoonfuls of batter into fritters, then working in batches, fry fritters for 2-3 minutes on each side, until brown and cooked. Serve with mayonnaise or lemon wedges (optional).

hintsAndTricks: We served these fritters with Vegan mayonnaise, please refer to the recipe on this recipe chip.
